full_text: S1 E9 of For All Mankind: https://t.co/va2QWtUhYS

We've been watching Cheers and I recognized a name in the end credits. Turns out that its art director would go on to be the production designer on DS9. Which means the same guy designed Cheers and Quark's! Herman Zimmerman: King of a Very Specific Niche.
